Description: Poster warns civilians to pay attention to wounded soldiers on the Metro (subway). In the corner, a  French infantryman stands defiantly astride a milestone marked 'Villeroy' and 'Paris'. A German pickelhaube helmet lies discarded at his feet.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection

Subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918--Propaganda; Posters; Lithographs; World War, 1914-1918--Art and the war; World War, 1914-1918--Military personnel; World War, 1914-1918--France
Title: Faites attention à nos blessés!
